operations.content:
api:
  export_suppliers:
    endpoint: /api/export_suppliers.php
    method: GET
    parameters:
      - name: supplier_id
        in: query
        required: true
        type: string
    responses:
      '200':
        description: Successful response
        schema:
          type: object
          properties:
            data:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/definitions/supplier'
      '404':
        description: Supplier not found
    definitions:
      supplier:
        type: object
        properties:
          id:
            type: string
          name:
            type: string
